title: Inordinate Desire
description: One Urge, One Plea, Keep Me Trilogy must be read prior to Inordinate Desire.In this addition to the One Urge, One Plea, Keep Me Trilogy, Damon and Alayna are learning to find the balance in themselves and their newfound relationship. After acquiring Vasser Publishing, Damon is forced to put in countless hours at the office, which leaves Alayna time to wonder if she is falling short in meeting his desires. She is secretly curious, wanting Damon to take her farther into the sexual world he once played in, but Damon is rediscovering Reed, believing that side of him is what Alayna yearns for.Her brother, Curtis, has a profound reason to disapprove of Alayna and Damon’s relationship and is determined to get her away from the man she has committed her future to. Alayna’s loyalty to Damon is put to the ultimate test, forcing her to make a decision that no one should ever have to make. What will she decide when seconds matter most? And will this passionate couple, who love and honor at a depth beyond reason, finally have their happily ever after?This novel is for a mature audience due to descriptive sexual scenes and harsh language.
author: Scarlet Wolfe
